question: You recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at the hotel. Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. In your letter.•	Say where you think you left the papers•	Explain why they are so important•	Tell the manager what you want him /her to do
text: I am Mohammad Mohammad who was a guest of your hotel for a meeting on the 22 of May.This letter is to express the document that I had left at the hotel.

As I came to attend a meeting,I forgot to pick up my paper from where I left it in my room.Moreover,if you cannot find it,I perhaps have lost it in the meeting hall,please inform your staff to check the address.

The paper is very important for me so as to I had written the main subject that is relevant to a contract that I will work with that company in the future.The contract has a stamp,so this is momentous that it is not to be damaged.
If it would be possible,please declared to me and send the document via Fax,post or telegraph as soon as possible.
I look forward to receiving your response
